title: 'Disgusting'
body: 'I recieved pillow which thickness is like a bad sheets. I thought I have to pump air in it.'

title: 'Good choice for this pillow'
body: 'I bought this product and this very nice and comfortable I suggest people to buy this pillow at very low price'

title: 'Nice product'

title: 'Missing Pillow in the Set'
body: 'Only One Pillow Received in the Order
column5: But Original Order Invoice says Set of 2 Pillows. Send the Other Pillow ASAP!!!!'

title: 'Missing and defect product'
body: 'The product is awfully dirty and only one instead of two'
